content:
I did not notice the registration deadline policy change for the May FHIR Connectathon and missed the registration deadline by 2 days. I am one of the major FHIRcast contributors and have specific agenda items in that track. The II team recommended that I request to register only for this track so that I can contribute as planned. Is there any way in which I can do so (again, only to participate in the FHIRcast track) and who could help me do so?

Thank you for your help

Eric Martin said:

I did not notice the registration deadline policy change for the May FHIR Connectathon and missed the registration deadline by 2 days. I am one of the major FHIRcast contributors and have specific agenda items in that track. The II team recommended that I request to register only for this track so that I can contribute as planned. Is there any way in which I can do so (again, only to participate in the FHIRcast track) and who could help me do so?

Thank you for your help

Hello Eric, The deadline was not to preclude contributors, only to help track leads organize well. I will send you an email this moment with instructions and thank you for reaching out!
Thank you Sandy, it worked great. I am in and HL7 has more money :-)
